long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dropton allows owners of dropshipping business to place ant track multiple ClickFunnels orders on AliExpress in a few clicks.

✔ Few Click Fulfilment
Place multiple ClickFunnels orders on AliExpress in just few clicks

✔ Auto-filled Checkout Form
No more copy & paste, Dropton automatically fills checkout form at AliExpress

✔ Auto Order Tracking
Automatically update order tracking, let your customers know where their items are to diminish your customer support

✔ No More Heavy Google Sheets
No need to use Google Sheets for order management. Dropton does it for you while you focus on business.

✔ No More Costly Integrations
Export orders directly from ClickFunnels to Dropton. It saves you up to $250 per month.

✔ No More Dumb Copy & Paste
Dropton exports and place orders automatically. No more human mistakes.

✔ Upload Tracking Info to PayPal automatically
Dropton allows to sync tracking info with PayPal automatically. As a result your merchant account may have better customer feedback and good tracking record. This lead to low percentage of the rolling reserve.
